title: XDM Business Marketing List Members
description: Members/Persons/Contacts etc. associated with a marketing list.

xdm:marketingListMemberID.title: Marketing List Member ID
xdm:marketingListMemberID.description: Unique ID for the membership of this person to this marketing list.

xdm:personID.title: Person Identifier
xdm:personID.description: Unique ID for the person who is a member of this marketing list.

xdm:marketingListID.title: Marketing List Identifier
xdm:marketingListID.description: Unique ID for the marketing list this person is a member of.
